com.saptarshidebnath.lib.processrunner.output

Interface Output

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    OutputImpl

    public interface Output
    The Output of a run is returned as a reference of Output class. The interface for the Object which is going to be returned after running Runner.run() or Runner.runAsync().

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      File getMasterLogAsJson()
      Returns the master log file originally captured while executing the Process.
      int getReturnCode()
      Returns the process exit / return code.
      List<OutputRecord> grepForRegex(String regex)
      Search the master log file for the provided regex.
      File saveLog(File log)
      Prints the OutputRecord.getOutputText() of both OutputSourceType.SYSERR and OutputSourceType.SYSOUT to the File supplied.
      File saveSysError(File sysError)
      Prints the OutputRecord.getOutputText() of type OutputSourceType.SYSERR to the File supplied.
      File saveSysOut(File sysOut)
      Prints the OutputRecord.getOutputText() of type OutputSourceType.SYSOUT to the File supplied.
      boolean searchMasterLog(String regex)
      Search the content of the Configuration.getMasterLogFile() for a particular regex.

    • Method Detail

      • saveSysOut

        File saveSysOut(File sysOut)
         throws ProcessException,
                ProcessConfigurationException,
                IOException
        Prints the OutputRecord.getOutputText() of type OutputSourceType.SYSOUT to the File supplied.
        Parameters:
        sysOut - A File object where the log is going to be written.
        Returns:
        A File object where the log has been written.
        Throws:
        ProcessException - In case of any error. This is a generic error. To get the details, please use Throwable.getCause().
        ProcessException - is a generic Exception
        ProcessConfigurationException - if the Configuration.masterLogFile is not set. If the Configuration.masterLogFile is not set then the log is not saved at all and they are discarded.
        IOException - is thrown on any disk error.

      • saveSysError

        File saveSysError(File sysError)
           throws ProcessException,
                  ProcessConfigurationException,
                  IOException
        Prints the OutputRecord.getOutputText() of type OutputSourceType.SYSERR to the File supplied.
        Parameters:
        sysError - A File object where the log is going to be written.
        Returns:
        A File object where the log has been written.
        Throws:
        ProcessException - In case of any error. This is a generic error. To get the details, please use Throwable.getCause().
        IOException - is thrown on any disk error.
        ProcessConfigurationException - if the Configuration.masterLogFile is not set. If the Configuration.masterLogFile is not set then the log is not saved at all and they are discarded.

      • getMasterLogAsJson

        File getMasterLogAsJson()
                 throws ProcessConfigurationException
        Returns the master log file originally captured while executing the Process. Its an Json Array of type OutputRecord.
        Returns:
        a File reference to the json formatted master log .
        Throws:
        ProcessConfigurationException - if the Configuration.masterLogFile is not set. If the Configuration.masterLogFile is not set then the log is not saved at all and they are discarded.

      • saveLog

        File saveLog(File log)
      throws IOException,
             ProcessConfigurationException
        Prints the OutputRecord.getOutputText() of both OutputSourceType.SYSERR and OutputSourceType.SYSOUT to the File supplied.
        Parameters:
        log - A File object where the log is going to be written.
        Returns:
        A File object where the log is going to be written.
        Throws:
        IOException - when there is a issue with the IO for reading and writing the file.
        ProcessConfigurationException - if the Configuration.masterLogFile is not set. If the Configuration.masterLogFile is not set then the log is not saved at all and they are discarded.

      • getReturnCode

        int getReturnCode()
        Returns the process exit / return code.
        Returns:
        return the exit code as an integer value from 0 - 255

      • searchMasterLog

        boolean searchMasterLog(String regex)
                 throws IOException,
                        ProcessConfigurationException
        Search the content of the Configuration.getMasterLogFile() for a particular regex. The search is done line by line.
        Parameters:
        regex - a proper Regular Expression that need to be searched for.
        Returns:
        a Boolean.TRUE or Boolean.FALSE depending upon if the search is positive or negative.
        Throws:
        ProcessConfigurationException - if the Configuration.masterLogFile is not set. If the Configuration.masterLogFile is not set then the log is not saved at all and they are discarded.
        IOException - if there is an error reading the Configuration.masterLogFile

      • grepForRegex

        List<OutputRecord> grepForRegex(String regex)
                         throws IOException,
                                ProcessConfigurationException
        Search the master log file for the provided regex.

        Searches for a pattern and returns a List of OutputRecord which contains extracts from the output matching the provided regex ins String format

        Parameters:
        regex - accepts a String object to search for
        Returns:
        a List of String
        Throws:
        ProcessConfigurationException - if the Configuration.masterLogFile is not set. If the Configuration.masterLogFile is not set then the log is not saved at all and they are discarded.
        IOException - if there is an error reading the Configuration.masterLogFile
